long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Auditing for Education allows administrators to easily audit online traffic from the Chrome browser or ChromeOS devices -- even while roaming outside your firewall. Log data is beautifully presented in a fast, easy, searchable format through our Scooped framework.

- Monitor Chrome activity anytime, anywhere
- Search log data by email, date, IP address, keyword or topic
- Beautiful analytics help you understand how devices are being used (or abused)
- High risk online activity is pushed into an easily managed moderation queue
- Real-time traffic filtering lets you isolate traffic instantly by keyword
- Malware detection helps identify potentially infected Chrome instances
- Chrome extension tracking lets you see what extensions are installed in each user instance

Our company mission is to help identify vulnerable students who are participating in high risk, online activity. Research from partnering school board consistently indicates students regularly use school-owned devices to participate in or learn about high risk activity. Since our launch we have helped identify and intervene student suicides, school violence incidents, child abuse and pornography addiction.

The Imagine Everything company is partially owned and operated by school boards.
